title: China's parliament remakes Hong Kong in its own image
content:
1. China's parliament remakes Hong Kong in its own image  BBC News
  2. China's parliament endorses plan to 'improve' Hong Kong elections, further curbing opposition  CNN
  3. China All but Ends Hong Kong Democracy With ‘Patriots Only’ Rule  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Japan mourns Fukushima victims ten years later, China looks to change Hong Kong's electoral system  Yahoo Finance
  5. China's Baidu to sell around 4% of shares in HK listing: sources  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
